name: Jump Start Banners
author: Jason Bobich

sections.description: The Jump Start theme had a feature for adding banners to pages and posts in v2.0. However, in v2.1 this feature was removed in favor of a better system of implementing the standard WordPress featured image for a similar effect. For those that want to continue relying on the previous banner feature, this plugin restores that functionality in Jump Start 2.1+.
sections.installation:
1. Upload jumpstart-banners folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the “Banners” meta box when editing a post or page.

short_description: Restores the banner functionality from Jump Start v2.0, when updating to v2.1+.
description: The Jump Start theme had a feature for adding banners to pages and posts in v2.0. However, in v2.1 this feature was removed in favor of a better system of implementing the standard WordPress featured image for a similar effect. For those that want to continue relying on the previous banner feature, this plugin restores that functionality in Jump Start 2.1+.
